text: Picabo Street (born April 3, 1971) in Idaho. She is a retired alpine ski racer who won gold medals at 1998 Winter Olympics and downhill at the 1996 World Championships. She also won silver medals at 1994 Winter Olympics and won World Cup downhill titles in 1995 and 1996, making her the first American woman to do so. ==References== Category:Sportspeople from Idaho Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:American skiers Category:1971 births Category:Living people
title: Picabo Street
